title: Shawn_Mendes_Treat_You_Better_0
lyrics:
I won't lie to you
I know he's just not right for you
And you can tell me if I'm off
But I see it on your face
When you say that he's the one that you want
And you're spending all your time
In this wrong situation
And anytime you want it to stop

I know I can treat you better than he can
And any girl like you deserves a gentleman
Tell me, why are we wasting time
On all your wasted cryin'
When you should be with me instead?
I know I can treat you better
Better than he can

I'll stop time for you
The second you say you'd like me to
I just wanna give you the loving that you're missing
Baby, just to wake up with you
Would be everything I need and this could be so different
Tell me what you want to do

'Cause I know I can treat you better than he can
And any girl like you deserves a gentleman
Tell me, why are we wasting time
On all your wasted cryin'
When you should be with me instead?
I know I can treat you better
Better than he can
Better than he can

Give me a sign
Take my hand, we'll be fine
Promise I won't let you down
Just know that you don't
Have to do this alone
Promise I'll never let you down

'Cause I know I can treat you better than he can
And any girl like you deserves a gentleman
Tell me, why are we wasting time
On all your wasted cryin'
When you should be with me instead?
I know I can treat you better
Better than he can
Better than he can
Better than he can

Kun sinun pitäisi olla kanssani

title: Shawn_Mendes_Treat_You_Better_4
lyrics:

Θα σου φερθω καλυτερα

I know he's just not right for you
Ξερω οτι αυτος δεν ειναι καταλληλος για σενα

But I see it on your face
Αλλα το βλεπω στο προσωπο σου
When you say that he's the one that you want
Οταν εσυ λες οτι ειναι αυτος ο οποιος θελεις
And you're spending all your time
Και αφιερωνεις ολο τον χρονο σου
In this wrong situation
Μεσα σε αυτην την λανθασμενη κατευθυνση
And anytime you want it to stop
Και ολη την ωρα θελεις να σταματησεις
I know I can treat you better than he can
Ξερω οτι μπορω να σου φερθω καλυτερα απο οτι αυτος
And any girl like you deserves a gentleman
Και οποιοδηποτε κοριτσι οπως εσυ αξιζει εναν κυριο
Tell me why are we wasting time
Πες μου γιατι σπαταλαμε χρονο
On all your wasted crying

When you should be with me instead
Οταν εσυ μπορεις να μεινεις μαζι μου
I know I can treat you better

I'll stop time for you

The sеcond you say you'd like me to
Το δευτερο που λες οτι θα μπορουσες να εμοιαζες σε μενα
I just wanna give you the loving that you're missing
Εγω θελω να σου δωσω την αγαπη μου που σου λειπει
Baby, just to wake up with you
Μωρο μου θελω να ξυπναω μαζι σου
Would be everything I need and this could be so different
Θα ηθελα να ειμαι τα παντα το θελω και αυτο μπορει να ειναι τοσο διαφορετικο
Tell me what you want to do
Πες μου τι θελεις να κανω
'Cause I know I can treat you better than he can
Γιατι μπορω να σου συμπεριφερθω καλυτερα απο εκεινον

Πες μου γιατι σπαταλας τον χρονο σου
On all your wasted crying

When you should be with me instead
Οταν μπορεις να εισαι μαζι μου
I know I can treat you better
Ξερω οτι μπορω να σου συμπεριφερθω καλυτερα
Better than he can
Καλυτερα απο οτι εκεινος
Better than he can
Καλυτερα απο οτι εκεινος
Give me a sign
Δειξε μου ενα σημαδι
Take my hand, we'll be fine
Παρε το χερι μου ολα θα πανε καλα
Promise I won't let you down
Σου υποσχομαι οτι δεν θα σε αφησω να πεσεις

title: Shawn_Mendes_Treat_You_Better_6
lyrics:
Sana yalan söylemem
Biliyorum o sadece senin için uygun değil
Ve izinli olup olmadığımı söyleyebilirsin
Ama suratında görüyorum
O kişinin tek istediğin kişi olduğunu söyleyince
Ve sen bütün zamanın
Bu yanlış görevde harcıyorsun
Ve ne zaman istersen durdurursun

Biliyorum sana onun davrandığından daha iyi davranabilirim
Ve senin gibi her kız bir beyefendiyi hak eder
Anlat bana neden zamanımızı
Harcanmış bütün göz yaşlarında harcıyoruz?
Yerine benimle olabilirsin
Biliyorum ki sana daha iyi davranabilirim
Ondan daha iyi

İkinci sefer beni sevdiğin söylediğinde de

title: Shawn_Mendes_Treat_You_Better_7
lyrics:
Ma ei hakka sulle valetama
Ma tean et ta lihtsalt pole sulle õige
Ja sa võid öelda kui panen mööda
Aga ma näen seda su näol
Kui sa ütled, et ta on see keda tahad
Ja sa kulutad kogu oma aja

Kogu su raisatud nutule
Kui sa peaksid hoopis minuga olema
Ma tean, et ma suudan kohelda sind paremini

title: Shawn_Mendes_Treat_You_Better_9
lyrics:
Never would of understood it
Never would of come to do it
If I had knew the sum of it
Id of done it sooner
I don't want no one else
I've waited for someone else
Now they losing their chance
Cause they ain't giving a damn
I just want you to know
You deserve the whole world
Cause your a trophy women girl
But he ain't the right for you tho
Stuck in a love triangle
And I know someone always gets hurt
Lord I hope it's just not me or her

I see the way you look at him and I just want it
And its fucked up because I know he doesn’t
I hate myself, cause I convinced him to ask you out
Now i'm stuck, cause I’m the one left out
Now your key in a locked
Although, we FaceTime a lot
And we talk about anything
Never connected to anyone like we do any day
I'm the one you come to cry to
I just wonder if you feel like I do
You even said I wonder if he has someone, like I have you
Chorus

I know you love him, I know you care
I understand
But baby I'm a better man for you
Break my back and stand for you
We actually can have a conversation
What does he do?
It lit me on fire
When you said your crying
Cause you called
And he blew you off
That dick has some balls
But he's about to lose em all
Not tryna make you choose
But I wantchu
Right now I'm burning up
How dare him say he would give you up
Fuck em you'll be better off
Without him
Trust me look where it got him
Your posting things about him but he ain't do shit for you
I could love you like he could never do
Cause i'm just straight up better for you
He's an example of what I’d never be
Damn I want Jessie's girl
And it messes with me
Chorus

I don't the right move, I either lose him
Or I lose you
I'm just scared to mess things up because I have a heart
And it's been torn apart
But you're worth a new start
You’ve been there for me
That means a lot
Now imma do everything within my power to-keep-that-spot
And mirror it
Hopefully make it clearer for you to see
That all I want is for you is to be with me
Not him, he's flirting with other women
Why would you still be with him
At least I can spit rhythm
And have a serious moment
Cherish you, for you
Sounds good don’t it?
Not make fun of your country side
Making you live a lie
Lie with me, and see
I'll take you wherever in the world you wanna be
